name: Pepsico
description: DRC official online ordering and home delivery website and app of Dubai Refreshment & Pepsi Dubai. People can find DRC products categorized into Carbonated Soft drinks, Aquafina, Gatorade, Lipton Ice Tea, Top Fruit Juices, Robinsons Real Fruit Juice, Teisseire Syrup, Snacks, Cakes, Ice Creams, etc. People can order anything from a range of products from the comfort of their homes, and the Pepsi team will deliver to their doorstep.

name: Busch Jaeger
description:
Control Touch transforms the office into an intelligent workplace. Whether blinds, 
lights, heating, air conditioning, door communication or scenes. Easy to remote control via a switch on the wall with the smartphone or tablet. name: DRC
